_sText:
= Surf_Chasm by Sid =

This map has been in the works for a while, and I'm very happy that I committed to the project. The final result is a fantastic map and I'm very proud to release Surf_Chasm!

Set inside a large earthquake split, an industrial company saw profit in a liquid that had been exposed. What did they find? Why did they abandon the project? Why does a surf map need a plot? These questions are not for me to answer. All I know is the obstacles and sights of Chasm will have you coming back for more.

- Tier 4 Linear
- 4 bonus stages featuring the work of Sagan, Spy Complex and Donkey!
